event.title: thousands of years the area was inhabited

data.event: For thousands of years the area was inhabited by indigenous peoples.

event.title: was established by European Americans on June 29, 1815

data.event: Monroe County was established by European Americans on June 29, 1815.

event.title: were removed from Alabama to Indian Territory (now

data.event: Most of the Creek people were removed from Alabama to Indian Territory (now Oklahoma) in the 1830s.
